##Instructions

Create a web page using R Markdown that features a map created with Leaflet.

Host your webpage on either GitHub Pages, RPubs, or NeoCities.

Your webpage must contain the date that you created the document, and it must contain a map created with Leaflet. We would love to see you show off your creativity!

```{r setup, include=TRUE}
library(leaflet)
library(shiny)

my_map <- leaflet() %>% addTiles( ) 

my_map <- my_map %>% addTiles( "My favorite places in Bogotá" ) 

my_map <- my_map %>% addMarkers(lat=4.6454199, lng=-74.0618655, popup="Parque de los Hippies, Bogotá - Colombia")
my_map <- my_map %>% addMarkers(lat=4.6056728, lng= -74.0577142, popup="Monserrate, Bogotá - Colombia")

my_map <- my_map %>% addMarkers(lat=4.5968179, lng= -74.0753402, popup="Museo de Botero, Bogotá - Colombia")

my_map <- my_map %>% addMarkers(lat=4.5981259, lng= -74.0782322, popup="Plaza Bolivar, Bogotá - Colombia")

my_map <- my_map %>% addMarkers(lat=4.5981561, lng= -74.0776482,  popup="Catedral Primada de Colombia, Bogotá - Colombia")

my_map
```
